Change History

Revision Date Notes
2.0.0 2019-07-17 Added SmartConnectClient2 service to indicate the following action now requires authentication:
  • GetClientDeviceInfo
  • StartSmartConnectClient
  • Detach
1.0.0 2017-05-19 Initial release.
1.0.1 2017-09-05 Added action Detach.

Services

SmartConnectClient

http://linksys.com/jnap/smartconnect/SmartConnectClient

Service Actions

  • Detach
  • GetClientDeviceInfo
  • StartSmartConnectClient

SmartConnectClient2

http://linksys.com/jnap/smartconnect/SmartConnectClient2

Service Actions

  • Detach
  • GetClientDeviceInfo
  • StartSmartConnectClient

Actions

Detach

http://linksys.com/jnap/smartconnect/Detach
This action discontinues communication with the SmartConnect server.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/smartconnect/DetachResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/smartconnect/Detach"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

GetClientDeviceInfo

http://linksys.com/jnap/smartconnect/GetClientDeviceInfo
This service implements functionality that is common to SmartConnect client nodes. This action returns basic information about the SmartConnect client device.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
description string no A description of the device.
serialNumber string no The serial number of the device.
model string no The device model name.
vendor string no The device vendor name.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/smartconnect/GetClientDeviceInfoResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/smartconnect/GetClientDeviceInfo"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "description": "Belkin EX9000 Example Device",
    "serialNumber": "XXXX-XXXXXXX-12345",
    "model": "EX9000",
    "vendor": "Belkin International"
  }
}

StartSmartConnectClient

http://linksys.com/jnap/smartconnect/StartSmartConnectClient
This action triggers the SmartConnect client to connect to the SmartConnect server and run setup.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
serverSSID string no The SSID of the SmartConnect server AP to connect to for setup.
setupPIN string yes The SmartConnect client PIN to use for setup.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/smartconnect/StartSmartConnectClientResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorStartClientFailed Failed to start the SmartConnect client.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/smartconnect/StartSmartConnectClient"

{
  "serverSSID": "Linksys00131-SCS",
  "setupPIN": "12345"
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}
